name: Just Bleeps No Blobs
description:
There is no blob this time, BUT WE ARE STILL GONNA BLEEP 'EM UP!

                                                                                   

Ayyo, it's TanzDev here!

Back with another schmup/bullet hell! I don't know why am I really invested with this particular genre, but it's really satisfying to see projectiles flying all over the screen~

This was more of an experimental project. I tried to improve some aspects from my previous game, implementing new stuff and adapt several elements from Touhou Project games.

Thank you for checking out the game and I hope you're having fun!
